plot: Enrique is a samurai, or so he thinks. After being fired from his job, is dedicated to delivering justice on the streets. One day he finds a young woman in trouble, coming to his aid and facing powerful enemies.
title: Croquetas de Samurái
plot_es: Enrique is a samurai, or so he thinks. After being fired from his job, is dedicated to delivering justice on the streets. One day he finds a young woman in trouble, coming to his aid and facing powerful enemies.
plot_en: Enrique is a samurai, or so he thinks. After being fired from his job, is dedicated to delivering justice on the streets. One day he finds a young woman in trouble, coming to his aid and facing powerful enemies.
